item.title: 机器人初创公司 Physical Intelligence 获得 56 亿美元新融资
item.description: 据知情人士透露，开发人工智能软件以帮助机器人学习各种任务的初创公司 Physical Intelligence 在新一轮融资中筹集了 6 亿美元，公司估值达 56 亿美元。【原文：Physical Intelligence, a startup developing artificial intelligence software to help robots learn a wide range of tasks, has raised $600 million in a new round of funding that values the company at $5.6 billion, according to people with knowledge of the matter.Alphabet Inc.’s independent growth fund CapitalG led the round, with participation from existing investors Lux Capital, Thrive Capital and Amazon.com Inc. founder Jeff Bezos, said the people, who asked not to be identified discussing priva】

item.title: 墨西哥增长乏力导致物价降温，贸易不确定性也是影响因素之一
item.description: 根据墨西哥中央银行最近一次利率决议的会议记录，大多数董事会成员表示，墨西哥疲软的经济将有助于缓解未来几个月的通胀压力。【原文：Mexico’s sluggish economy will help ease inflationary pressures in the upcoming months, according to the minutes of the central bank’s latest rate decision citing most board members.】

item.title: 印度信实公司停止在部分重要炼油厂使用俄罗斯石油
item.description: 印度信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Limited）表示，由于美国的制裁迫使该公司回避与莫斯科的交易，它将停止在其巨型贾姆纳加尔炼油厂的一部分加工俄罗斯石油。【原文：India’s Reliance Industries Limited said it would stop processing Russian oil at part of its giant Jamnagar oil refinery as US sanctions force the company to shy away from dealings with Moscow.】

item.title: 华尔街担心人工智能泡沫。英伟达刚刚给出了答案
item.description:
英伟达的财报平息了人们对人工智能泡沫的担忧，但它尚未走出困境。在今天的 "Big Take "播客中，我们将探讨该公司在追赶全球需求时面临的挑战。【原文：

Nvidia’s earnings calmed fears of an AI bubble, but it isn’t out of the woods yet. On today’s Big Take podcast we look at the challenges the company faces as it races to keep up with global demand.

】

item.title: 埃及在通胀意外上升后维持利率不变
item.description: 埃及维持利率不变，在通胀率五个月来首次意外加快后选择谨慎行事。【原文：Egypt left interest rates unchanged, opting for caution after inflation unexpectedly quickened for the first time in five months.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油公司建议派发 2020 年以来最低中期股息
item.description: 由于原油价格下滑、卢布走强和美国制裁迫在眉睫，俄罗斯石油巨头俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft PJSC）计划在 2020 年支付自大流行病以来最低的中期股息。【原文：Russian oil giant Rosneft PJSC plans to pay the lowest interim dividends since the pandemic in 2020 as slumping crude prices, a stronger ruble and looming US sanctions bite.】

item.title: 联邦通信委员会废除拜登时代旨在应对盐台风的网络规则
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会投票决定撤销拜登时代的网络安全法规，这些法规旨在解决去年影响主要电信运营商的大规模网络入侵（被称为 "盐台风"）问题。【原文：The Federal Communications Commission voted to roll back Biden-era cybersecurity regulations designed to address the massive network intrusion known as Salt Typhoon that affected major telecommunications carriers last year.】

item.title: Citadel 的鲁布纳认为 S&P 500 指数在 "健康 "回调后将反弹至 7,000 点
item.description: Citadel 证券公司的斯科特-鲁伯纳（Scott Rubner）认为，近期 S&P 500 指数的 "健康 "回调为强劲反弹奠定了基础，市场定位和季节性趋势有望推动反弹至年底。【原文：A recent “healthy” pullback in the S&P 500 Index has set the stage for a powerful rebound, according to Citadel Securities’ Scott Rubner, with market positioning and seasonal trends poised to fuel a rally into year-end.】

item.title: 南非央行行长称人工智能泡沫给新兴市场带来风险
item.description: 南非央行行长莱塞特贾-克加亚戈（Lesetja Kganyago）表示，人工智能股票的繁荣正在带来泡沫风险，可能威胁新兴市场。【原文：The boom in artificial intelligence stocks is creating a risk of a bubble, which could threaten emerging markets, South Africa’s central bank Governor Lesetja Kganyago said.】

item.title: Bath & Body Works 的债券风险因零售商下调前景而上升
item.description: 周四，保护 Bath & Body Works 公司债务免于违约的成本跃升至七个月高点，此前该零售商下调了财年展望，并宣布了一项扭亏为盈计划，重新专注于其核心产品。【原文：The cost of protecting Bath & Body Works Inc.’s debt against default jumped to a seven-month high on Thursday, after the retailer cut its fiscal-year outlook and announced a turnaround plan to refocus on its core offerings.】

item.title: 雅培签订 2025 年最大一笔过桥贷款，为收购提供资金支持
item.description: 雅培实验室（Abbott Laboratories）从摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）获得了今年最大的一笔高评级过桥贷款（200 亿美元），为其收购 Exact Sciences 公司提供资金。【原文：Abbott Laboratories has teed up the largest high-grade bridge loan this year — a $20 billion facility from Morgan Stanley — to fund its acquisition of Exact Sciences Corp.】

item.title: 保罗-都铎-琼斯支持的 Numerai 获得 5 亿美元估值
item.description: 亿万富翁保罗-都铎-琼斯（Paul Tudor Jones）支持的一家众包对冲基金从大学捐赠基金和风险投资公司筹集了新资金，估值达 5 亿美元，因为其非常规选股模式的表现优于同行。【原文：A crowdsourcing hedge fund backed by billionaire Paul Tudor Jones has raised fresh capital from university endowments and venture firms at a valuation of $500 million, after its unconventional stock-picking model outperformed peers.】

item.title: 美联储库克密切关注私人信贷和资产估值
item.description: 美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）表示，由于杠杆公司的 "复杂性和相互关联性增加"，官员们应监测私人信贷中的意外损失可能如何扩散到更广泛的美国金融体系。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook said officials should monitor how unexpected losses in private credit may spread to the broader US financial system due to the “increased complexity and the interconnections” with leveraged firms.】

item.title: 巴格达接管销售权，卢克石油公司的伊拉克石油源源不断
item.description: 卢克石油公司（Lukoil PJSC）在伊拉克所占油田的石油正源源不断地流向全球市场，缓解了人们对俄罗斯能源巨头受到制裁后供应中断的担忧。【原文：Oil from Lukoil PJSC’s share of a field in Iraq is continuing to flow to global markets, alleviating concerns about supply disruption in the wake of sanctions on the Russian energy giant.】

item.title: 2025 年最激动人心的 ETF 基金发行指南
item.description:
仅今年一年，美国就发行了约 920 只交易所交易基金。在Trillions节目中，我们试图挑选出其中最值得关注的基金。【原文：

Some 920 exchange-traded funds have launched in the US this year alone. On Trillions, we attempt to pick the most notable among them. 

】

item.title: 网络战初创公司获得合同，为美军黑客提供人工智能工具
item.description:
Twenty 的技术可帮助军事黑客找到渗透目标的方法。【原文：

Twenty’s technology helps military hackers find ways to penetrate targets.

】

item.title: 人工智能泡沫的真正风险
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 美国农业部确认向中国出口更多大豆并首次出售小麦
item.description: 美国农业部宣布向中国出售更多的美国大豆，并首次向这个亚洲国家出售小麦。【原文：The US Department of Agriculture announced more sales of American soybeans to China along with the first known sales of wheat to the Asian nation.】

item.title: 和解失败后，Skechers 投资者提起 3G 收购诉讼
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，对冲基金和其他大型投资者在法庭上质疑 3G Capital 以 94 亿美元收购 Skechers USA Inc.【原文：Hedge funds and other big investors challenging 3G Capital’s $9.4 billion purchase of Skechers USA Inc. in court failed to reach an early settlement with the footwear maker as the fight over the deal price forges ahead, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 玻利维亚计划到 2027 年重返国际信贷市场
item.description: 玻利维亚财政部长何塞-加布里埃尔-埃斯皮诺萨（José Gabriel Espinoza）在接受采访时说，玻利维亚新政府预计明年将获得多达 50 亿美元的多边贷款，并于 2026 年底或 2027 年初重返国际信贷市场。【原文：Bolivia’s new government expects to secure up to $5 billion in multilateral loans next year and return to international credit markets in late 2026 or early 2027, Finance Minister José Gabriel Espinoza said in an interview.】

item.title: 巴尔称美联储在通胀率仍为 3% 的情况下必须谨慎行事
item.description: 美联储理事迈克尔-巴尔（Michael Barr）表示，在通胀率仍比目标高出整整一个百分点的情况下，美国央行在考虑进一步降息时需要谨慎行事。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Michael Barr said the US central bank needs to proceed with caution in considering additional interest-rate cuts with inflation still running a full percentage point above its target.】

item.title: 加拿大监管机构计划放宽银行规则以增加商业贷款
item.description: 加拿大银行业监管机构正在提议放宽某些企业和房地产贷款的资本规定，旨在促进该国更多的商业投资。【原文：Canada’s banking regulator is proposing to ease capital rules for certain corporate and real estate loans, aiming to fuel more business investment in the country.】

item.title: 谷歌在新图像生成模型中解决人工智能的拼写问题
item.description: 虽然人工智能助手在聊天回复中听起来很自信，但如果你要求它们生成一张包含多个文字短语的图片，那么生成的图片很可能会包含一些错别字或字体变形。【原文：As confident as artificial intelligence assistants can sound in chat responses, if you ask them to generate an image containing several text phrases, chances are the resulting imagery will contain some typos or distorted fonts.】

item.title: 受利率影响，美国 10 月现房销售创八个月新高
item.description: 10 月份，美国旧房销售量创下八个月来的最快增速，原因是在一些市场，买家利用较低的抵押贷款利率，抢占了卖家的先机。【原文：Sales of previously owned homes in the US rose at the fastest pace in eight months in October, as buyers took advantage of lower mortgage rates and gained the upper hand over sellers in some markets.】

item.title: 英伟达财报缓解人工智能泡沫担忧，美股反弹
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）的季度收益强于预期，缓解了人们对人工智能股票价值可能被高估的担忧，周四美国股市飙升。【原文：US stocks soared on Thursday after stronger-than-expected quarterly earnings from Nvidia Corp. eased fears that AI stocks may have become overvalued.】

item.title: 任天堂和《战地 6》推动 10 月份美国游戏销量增长
item.description: 根据市场研究公司 Circana 的最新报告，电子艺界公司的《战地 6》只用了不到一个月的时间就成为今年美国最畅销的游戏。【原文：Electronic Arts Inc.’s Battlefield 6 needed less than a month to become this year’s best-selling game in the US, according to the latest report from market research firm Circana.】

item.title: 甲骨文 CDS 市场大爆发，人工智能崩溃的对冲方案应运而生
item.description: 甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp. ），这家曾经呆板的数据库巨头借贷了数百亿美元，并将自己的命运与人工智能的繁荣联系在一起，正迅速成为信贷市场人工智能风险的晴雨表。【原文：Oracle Corp., the once stodgy database giant that’s borrowed tens of billions and tethered its fortunes to the artificial intelligence boom, is quickly emerging as the credit market’s barometer for AI risk.】

item.title: 安大略省医疗保健养老金分支将借款 5 亿加元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，安大略省医疗保健养老金计划（Healthcare of Ontario Pension Plan）的房地产融资机构 HOOPP Realty Finance 正寻求在首次债券发行中筹集多达 5 亿加元（约合 3.56 亿美元）的资金。【原文：HOOPP Realty Finance, the real estate financing arm of Healthcare of Ontario Pension Plan, is looking to raise as much as C$500 million ($356 million) in an inaugural bond offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Esentia 和 Holder 在墨西哥首次公开募股和配售中筹集 5.487 亿美元资金
item.description: 中游天然气公司 Esentia Energy Development 及其股东之一通过在墨西哥首次公开发行股票和私募融资 100.8 亿比索（约合 5.487 亿美元），该公司希望利用所谓的近岸化趋势。【原文：Midstream gas company Esentia Energy Development and one of its shareholders have raised 10.08 billion pesos ($548.7 million) through an initial public offering in Mexico and a private placement, as the firm looks to capitalize on the so-called nearshoring trend.】

item.title: 失业率上升后美国国债上涨
item.description: 在一份喜忧参半的就业报告使美联储下月降息的可能性得以保持后，国债上涨。【原文：Treasuries gained after a mixed jobs report kept the likelihood of a Federal Reserve rate cut next month alive.】
